data.title: North By Northwest
data.text:
(1959, DCP, 136m) dir Alfred Hitchcock w/Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason. Charming ad man Roger O. Thornhill (Grant) must run for his life when a criminal organization mistakes him for an American spy. While managing to avoid successive attempts on his life, one involving a crop-dusting, gun-toting plane in the middle of Indiana, poor Thornhill must save not only himself but also the beautiful Eve Kendall (Saint). At the Heights Theater!

7:30 $12
